title: Trends in Blended Learning Research and Practical Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory online learning platform experience and adult education basics
context.additional_context: Optimizing mobile-based learning environments for managers in corporate R&D departments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the nine core research topics of blended learning (learner outcomes, interaction design, etc.).
Learners can propose two or more blended learning models applicable in resource-constrained technological environments.
In science education design, one can comparatively analyze the strengths and weaknesses of blended learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
